title: How exactly are you supposed to deal with camping in Mid?
body:
Things I'm already doing:

* Warding
   1. Buying pinks
   2. Placing ward whenever it's off cd
   3. Hugging the side that's warded


* Playing safe (staying as far back as I can to get farm, in extreme cases barely in XP range)

* Not taking risky minions or unnecessarily pushing the wave


Scenario specific, last game (Link: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2219639807/39649507?tab=overview for reference) I was getting shit on from constant ganks from Rengar.

I died pre-6 due to a misplay when I got ganked by rengar (Eing before Qing my soldier towards tower, so I ended up Eing away from turret) but after that I was basically dead every time Rengar had his ult up because of how fast he'd murder me and with no time to ult myself because of the Zilean speedup. On top of that Malphite roamed down a few times to join in on the gangbang.

I blame dynamic queue.
